comment: I edited my rating because she did help me out a lot when I was having trouble, which I greatly appreciate. I still stand by most of what I said regarding the hard to follow accent and her VERY slow grading (2 months late). However, her willingness to help definitely gives her more credit than a 1 star rating, there are worse teachers here than her
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: She does have an accent but is very willing to go out of her way to help you. Her class is very simple and easy, you really shouldn't be struggling in this class. She does understand English! If you actually pay attention,Interact and ask questions you will learn.

Her Accent is super hard to understand. The only good thing is that she is easy to reach but even then she tells you just to go back in watch the videos. She makes a few of them but they don't help either.

Her accent is incredibly hard to follow, and overall she doesn't give any true help understanding. She mostly points at our professors work and tries to explain as best she can. I had to take the class again bc I got sick and she wouldn't let me make up anything I missed. Never would take again unless you are a mind reader...

I didn't have any issue with her accent and felt like the directions were pretty clear...there was a few assignments that got dicey with instruction but she's pretty responsive so clarified for me quickly. Easy class.

Overall, it's an easy class, but she is one of the bossier and more difficult to understand teachers in my time. Do with that what you will, you can still pass without a problem, but it may not be the most fundamental decision in the terms of learning the content.
understanding was challenging at first but will be lenient with you, its a pretty easy class and easy credit to get

The hardest thing about this class was her accent. She doesnt really know what shes talking about sometimes as her powerpoints are word fro word from the text book. CM 2000 is probably the easiest construction management class. Overall a very easy class with a mediocre professor.
Her accent is hard to understand at times. Sometimes instructions are unclear, but the class is not difficult.
You will have to teach yourself.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: Would not recommend. Her lectures are very disorganized and do not make sense. You can barely understand what she is saying and it is very difficult to follow her lectures. She does a horrible job at explaining the material, so you will be teaching yourself in this class. Her test are 3 q's long so good luck.
